formattedAddress: 445 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 445 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: If your wish is to arrange a simple cremation and want a very simple way to arrange it, with no pressure, then Manhattan Online Cremation is the company you can trust. I did a thorough look at their website & found it very easy to navigate. Since I had never used them before I decided to call them up before I went in, but I moved forward with the online process because I felt it was important to know who I was dealing with. The staff was professional, knowledgeable and very nice. They are located in Manhattan in NYC, which I preferred.

text.text: If your wish is to arrange a simple cremation and want a very simple way to arrange it, with no pressure, then Manhattan Online Cremation is the company you can trust. The staff was professional, knowledgeable and very nice. They are located in Manhattan in NYC, which I preferred.

originalText.text: My goal was to find a simple, easy way to arrange a direct cremation without having to travel. I called and spoke to John, the manager of Manhattan Online Cremation and he immediately put my mind at ease and patiently answered all of my questions. It was important to me that the firm handling my loved ones cremation was based in Manhattan, where I also live. The price was very reasonable, much less than the other Manhattan funeral homes I called. More importantly, I felt cared for in a special way. I was treated respectfully and in a very sincere manner. I highly recommend this company. Thank you John for putting my mind at ease.

originalText.text: I spoke with a few other cremation companies but i wasn't satisfied until i spoke with Manhattan Online Cremation. Jared and John were wonderful! They made everything so easy and helped me through a very difficult time of my life. They are very honest, easy to work with, and accommodated all my requests. What impressed me the most was how kind and knowledgeable they were. Their online arrangement process was vey easy to complete and it saved me the trouble of traveling to them. However, I decided to pick up the ashes a few weeks later because they are in Midtown Manhattan and i wanted to thank them in person.The facility is beautiful. I'm very grateful and would recommend them without hesitation.

originalText.text:
Great Website with very fair pricing, professional and reliable.
No pressure. They understand that some cremation customers want "no services". Very accommodating and polite !
